tool.name: saturation-filtering
tool.description: Perform quality checking and filtering on raw count data from single cell RNA-Seq experiment using saturation model

param.name: norm_threshold
param.label: Minimum for fitting values probability under Gaussian assumption

param.name: rounding
param.label: Magnitude of number of round rounding for saturation calculation

param.name: prop_mt
param.label: Maximum proportion of mitochondrially aligned reads

param.name: prop_sp
param.label: Maximum proportion of exogenously aligned reads

param.name: nb_filters
param.label: Parameter for number of failed filters triggering removal
